content.question: In the third paragraph, which of the following does the author represent as an effect of “congregat[ing] in places of high environmental risk”?

choices.label: Opportunities that disproportionately benefit affluent communities
Frequent conflict among groups with different cultural values
Dangers that disproportionately affect certain communities
Overcrowding that exacerbates public health problems

content.answer: Dangers that disproportionately affect certain communities

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
